scripts.test:dmsProperties: node tests/dmsProperties.test.js || echo 'Run in browser: npm run dev, then open console and run: window.runDmsPropertiesTests()'
scripts.test:multivalueParsing: node tests/multivalueParsing.test.js || echo 'Run in browser: npm run dev, then open console and run: window.runMultivalueParsingTests()'
scripts.test:validationPayload: echo 'Run in browser: npm run dev, then open http://localhost:5173/tests/validation-payload.html'
